verbs.description: Less than a year after Kathy Griffin [V: was] pictured holding a fake bloodied , severed head of Donald Trump last May , the far - left comedian claims that the president has a “ vendetta ” against her and personally ordered Secret Service agents to investigate her . Griffin made the accusations while a guest on ABC ’s Start Here podcast after host Brad Mielke asked her if the President
